slide0.title: For those who live to dance
slide0.subtitle: The all-in-one assistant for dance studios and solo choreographers.

slide1.title: Stay in control of your schedule
slide1.subtitle: Easily create and manage private and group classes.

slide3.title: A team that moves in sync
slide3.subtitle: Invite trainers and manage classes together.

auth.title: Your Rhythm. Your System.
auth.subtitle: A flexible platform for dance instructors and studio teams

initial_actions.title: Take the First Step
initial_actions.subtitle: Select whether you want to create your own brand or join the team.

join_workspace.title: Join a Team
join_workspace.subtitle: Already part of the team? Scan the QR code to join or use your ID.

create_workspace.title: Create a Brand
create_workspace.subtitle: Add your dance brand and manage classes, students, and team members in one place.

card.title: Next Level Starts Here!
card.subtitle: Grow your dance team, open new locations, and attract more students to your classes.

description.ios: Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account. Your subscription will automatically renew at your selected interval unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. After the introductory offer, the subscription renews at the standard price. The amount charged may change with notice. You can manage or cancel your subscription in your App Store account settings. Cancel anytime.
description.android: Payment will be charged to your Google Play account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. After any introductory offer, the subscription renews at the full price. The subscription price may change with notice. You can manage or cancel your subscription in your Google Play account settings. Cancel anytime.

promo_code.title: Promo Code
promo_code.subtitle: Have a promo code? Apply it now to enjoy exclusive benefits from a DanceHub partner.

anniversary.title: Anniversary!
anniversary.message:
Congratulations on your anniversary!
Wishing {{brandName}} continuous growth, inspiration, and new achievements. May each coming year be even more successful!

opening.title: Grand Opening!
opening.message:
Congratulations on your grand opening!
May your launch be bright, your students loyal, and your brand quickly find its place in people’s hearts. Wishing you a successful journey ahead!

guide.title: Import Guide
guide.warning: Rows with invalid or incorrectly formatted data will be skipped. If certain information is unavailable, leave the field empty.

fields.name: Email
options: Format: Must be a valid email address.

fields.name: Phone
options: Format: Include the international country code.

fields.name: Address
options: For example, 221B Baker Street, London, UK

fields.name: Avatar
options: Format: URL link to the image

professionality.subtitle: Define the team member’s role and disable class assignments if needed.

location.title: Location & Schedule
location.subtitle: Set the new team member’s primary location and work schedule.

all.title: Access to Brand
all.subtitle: Enable adding, editing, and deleting brand-related information.

all.title: Access to Brand Notifications
all.subtitle: Enable receiving all brand notifications, not only those related to this team member.

all.title: Access to Students
all.subtitle: Enable adding, editing, and deleting student information.

all.subtitle: Enable adding, editing, and deleting classes, passes, and VIP passes.

all.subtitle: Enable adding, editing, and deleting location-related information.

all.title: Access to Class Bookings
all.subtitle: Enable adding, editing, and deleting class bookings.
